Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe and Afghanistan have played 12 T20Is so far, with Afghanistan winning 11 and Zimbabwe winning just one.
Afghanistan has won the recent three-match ODI series against Zimbabwe 3-0.
The visiting team will face heavy pressure in the T20 series based on this record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first T20I match between Zimbabwe and Afghanistan will be played on June 11, 2022, at Harare Sports Club, Harare.
The toss winner will decide to bat first, and the batting team will aim for a score above 150.
Others: Zimbabwe's playing XI includes Craig Ervine (captain), Regis Chakabva, Innocent Khaya, Milton Shumba, Saeed Zahra, Wesley Madhevere, Rayan Burrell, Blessing Murarabanai, Tendai Chatara, Luke Jongwe, Donald Tiripano.

Afghanistan's playing XI includes Mohammad Nabi (captain), Rahmatullah Gurbaz, Nazibullah Jadran, Hazratullah Zazai, Usman Ghani, Karim Janat, Azmatullah Omrajzai, Rashid Khan, Fazlakha Farooqui, Ferid Malik, Noor Ahmad.
